name: Manuj
p1_desc: 4 years ago, during the overview of autumn it was Manuj's first day at BITS Pilani along with a thousand more. Little did he know that this place would create the greatest memories of their lifetime!
p2_desc: And since then, his journey at BITS has been somewhat adventurous. But life does not give you the ability to just stick to one thing. As time passes, we must move on...
shortText2: Code.Fun.Do ke runner-up hai hamare bhaiya
